King's Cross

This is our final week on Cubitt Square

Time: 12pm-2pm
Who: 5+ Traders Each Day
When: Wednesdays-Fridays

 

KERB at KX is closing for the winter.

 

Cubitt Square is lovely but has proven unviable in bad weather and with the winter drawing in, we've made the decision to close the market. 

 

We are working on an alternative solution - more to follow!

 

 

King's Cross Market
